name: Match Join
description: Change topic of messages based on matching properties. Join messages based on matching properties.

minMsgCount.label: Min Message Count
minMsgCount.description: Minimum number of messages that must match

target.label: Set Topic
target.description: Sets the topic for matching messages

help.description: Matches incoming messages based on configured property comparisons, optionally sets topics, and can join multiple matched messages into a single output.

payload.name: payload
payload.description: Matched message or joined messages (depending on configuration)

details.text: Configure matchers to define which messages should be recognized. Each matcher compares a message property against a value using operations like equal, not equal, less than, greater than, etc.
When 'Set Topic' is configured, matching messages will have their topic changed to the configured value.
Enable 'Join' to collect multiple matched messages and combine them into a single message. Set 'Min Message Count' to specify how many messages must match before joining.
When joining, all matched message properties are combined into msg.payload as an object with properties named after their topics.
Enable 'Discard Not Matched' to block messages that don't match any configured matcher.
